mapper.sql: LOAN_SEQ, POLICY_COUNT, POLICY_NO, BANK_CODE, CHECK_DATE, PLAN_FEE, CAPITAL, INTAMT, PREMIUM, PENALSUM,SYSSTATE
mapper.insert: insert into CL_WITH_RECOVER (LOAN_SEQ, POLICY_COUNT, POLICY_NO, BANK_CODE, CHECK_DATE, PLAN_FEE, CAPITAL, INTAMT, PREMIUM, PENALSUM,SYSSTATE,SETLIND,DIFFTYPE) values (#{loanSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policyCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intamt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{premium,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{penalsum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{sysstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setlInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diffType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

POLICY_COUNT,

mapper.update:
update CL_WITH_RECOVER
POLICY_COUNT = #{policyCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLICY_NO = #{policyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CODE = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_FEE = #{planFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAPITAL = #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTAMT = #{intamt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREMIUM = #{premium,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PENALSUM = #{penalsum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LOAN_SEQ = #{loanSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from CL_WITH_RECOVER where POLICY_NO = #{POLICY_NO} and SYSSTATE=0
select count(1) from CL_WITH_RECOVER where POLICY_NO = #{POLICY_NO} and SETLIND='Y' and DIFFTYPE ='SUBROGATION'
